content: @Bolton Bailey, why do you need to open a PR for this? CI runs on all branches.
What I use personally is https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib/branches/yours. Very useful to track my innumerable branches.
I'd argue draft PRs are better than branches because it increases the chance that someone else might look at it when you abandon it
Well, you all can see previous discussion of this here. Not sure if it's a good change, but for myself I think it's interesting to investigate.
